name: EvaluatedCondition

constructors.name: EvaluatedCondition
constructors.signature: public EvaluatedCondition(String aggregateName, String aggregateLabel, Double compareToValue, Double aggregateValue, String displayCompareTo, String displayValue, Reports.EvaluatedConditionOperator operator)
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Reports.EvaluatedConditions class using the specified parameters.

params.name: operator
params.description: The unique API name of the aggregate. The localized display name of the aggregate. The value that the aggregate is compared to in the condition. The actual value of the aggregate when the report is run. The value that the aggregate is compared to in the condition, formatted for display. For example, a display value for a currency is $20.00 or USD20.00 instead of 20.00. The value of the aggregate when the report is run, formatted for display. For example, a display value for a currency is $20.00 or USD20.00 instead of 20.00. The operator used in the condition.

methods.name: getAggregateLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of the aggregate.

methods.name: getAggregateName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the aggregate.

methods.name: getCompareTo
methods.description: Returns the value that the aggregate is compared to in the condition.

methods.name: getDisplayCompareTo
methods.description: Returns the value that the aggregate is compared to in the condition, formatted for display. For example, a display value for a currency is $20.00 or USD20.00 instead of 20.00.

methods.name: getDisplayValue
methods.description: Returns the value of the aggregate when the report is run, formatted for display. For example, a display value for a currency is $20.00 or USD20.00 instead of 20.00.

methods.name: getOperator
methods.description: Returns the operator used in the condition.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the actual value of the aggregate when the report is run.

description: Contains the individual components of an evaluated condition for a report notification, such as the aggregate name and label, the operator, and the value that the aggregate is compared to.
